DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect single-dose steady-state Tipranavir/Ritonavir ( TPV/r ) 500 mg/200 mg bid steady-state pharmacokinetics clarithromycin determine effect standard high-fat test meal steady-state pharmacokinetics tipranavir .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Single-dose Steady-state TPV/r Steady-state Pharmacokinetics Clarithromycin Preliminary Assessment Effects Standard High-fat Test Meal Steady-state Pharmacokinetics Tipranavir
